page.title: 11Law and Order
page.content: The police in Rainford are part of the Merseyside force.They operate from a small station in Church Road.This station is only open on a part-time basis.The village is policed by patrol cars supplemented by the traffic division and by officers on the beat.The only time you see a lot of police at any one time is when a special event is taking place. The fire station in Rainford is situated in Crosspit Lane.The station has one engine.The station is manned by part-time retained firemen who have other jobs and are alerted by radio pagers when they are needed. There is no ambulance station in Rainford.In an emergency a vehicle would be dispatched from St.Helens Hospital.
